channel.title: Why cant i encrypt(password protect) my rar files with winrar?
channel.description:
why cant i encrypt(password protect) my rar files with winrar??
i keep saying set default password to a file but dont work. help plz

item.title: Why cant i encrypt(password protect) my rar files with winrar?
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

right click>add to archive

Then look for a tab that says advance.

Now look down the right hand side for a button that says set password.

Click it enter your passwords, then pross ok.

Read full topic
